seg.quote: Glenys leant out of the car window and swore at the other driver.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
TO-INF
or
REPORT VB

sense.def:
To swear to do something
pomeni slovesno obljubiti, da bomo nekaj naredili.

seg.quote: Will you swear not to run away and vanish?
I swear I will never tell anyone.

gramGrp.pos:
REPORT VB
or
VB
with
PREP
‘to’

sense.def:
To swear that something is true
ali
to swear to it
pomeni zelo odločno zatrditi, da je nekaj res.

seg.quote: I swear that he never consulted me.
...thousands of experts who would swear to its impossibility.

sense.def:
To swear by a particular thing
pomeni verjeti, da je nekaj zelo učinkovito ali zanesljivo;

seg.quote: He swears by my herbal tea to make him sleep.

sense.def:
To be sworn in
pomeni slovesno obljubiti, da bomo izpolnjevali dolžnosti na novem delovnem mestu ali položaju.

seg.quote: The jury was sworn in on May 4.
